articles.headline: Rise of Donald Trump Divides Black Celebrities He Calls His Friends
articles.snippet: Some of Mr. Trump’s African-American friends and acquaintances say they are mystified by the candidate’s sweeping attacks on minority groups. Others say he is misunderstood.
articles.abstract: Some of Mr. Trump’s African-American friends and acquaintances say they are mystified by the candidate’s sweeping attacks on minority groups. Others say he is misunderstood.
articles.lead_paragraph: Not long ago, Donald J. Trump and Russell Simmons were close.
articles.byline: By Maggie Haberman and Steve Eder

articles.headline: VW Executive Had a Pivotal Role as Car Maker Struggled With Emissions
articles.snippet: Wolfgang Hatz headed engine and transmission development at Volkswagen, which says it installed software in diesel cars to cheat on emissions tests.
articles.abstract: Wolfgang Hatz headed engine and transmission development at Volkswagen, which says it installed software in diesel cars to cheat on emissions tests.
articles.lead_paragraph: LONDON — A few months after taking over engine development at Volkswagen in 2007, Wolfgang Hatz faced a potential challenge that he considered insurmountable. It was the State of California.
articles.byline: By Danny Hakim and Jack Ewing

articles.headline: In Net-a-Porter and Yoox Merger, a Fight Behind the Scenes
articles.snippet: It looked like a smooth combination for two leading luxury e-commerce firms. However, a battle was simmering.
articles.abstract: It looked like a smooth combination for two leading luxury e-commerce firms. However, a battle was simmering.
articles.lead_paragraph: For many in the fashion industry, it appeared to be a smooth and logical merger.
articles.byline: By Michael J. de la Merced

articles.headline: Beyond ‘Star Wars,’ a Dark Force Looms for Disney: Cord-Cutting
articles.snippet: With more television networks bypassing cable packages and offering à la carte subscriptions, some predict trouble ahead for ESPN.
articles.abstract: With more television networks bypassing cable packages and offering à la carte subscriptions, some predict trouble ahead for ESPN.
articles.lead_paragraph: All anyone can talk about is “Star Wars: The Force Awakens” and the more than half-billion-dollar haul that the Walt Disney Company pulled in over the weekend.

articles.headline: Turkey Moves to Clamp Down on Border, Long a Revolving Door
articles.snippet: Under growing pressure from Europe and the United States, the country has worked to cut off flows of refugees and foreign fighters.
articles.abstract: Under growing pressure from Europe and the United States, the country has worked to cut off flows of refugees and foreign fighters.
articles.lead_paragraph: IZMIR, Turkey — The Turkish Coast Guard has stepped up nighttime patrols on the choppy, wintry waters of the Aegean Sea, seizing rafts full of refugees fleeing war for Europe and sending them back to Turkey.

articles.headline: Sued Over Old Debt, and Blocked From Suing Back
articles.snippet: Debt buyers are using the courts to sue consumers and collect debt, then preventing those same consumers from using the courts to mount a challenge.
articles.abstract: Debt buyers are using the courts to sue consumers and collect debt, then preventing those same consumers from using the courts to mount a challenge.
articles.lead_paragraph: Clifford Cain Jr., a retired electrician in Baltimore, was used to living on a tight budget, carefully apportioning his Social Security and pension benefits to cover his rent and medication for multiple sclerosis.
articles.byline: By Jessica Silver-Greenberg and Michael Corkery

articles.headline: Target’s Dog Mascot Learns New Tricks in Marketing Blitz
articles.snippet: Bullseye, the bull terrier with the hallmark eye paint, has re-emerged this holiday season as a signature part of Target’s efforts to revive its fading cachet.
articles.abstract: Bullseye, the bull terrier with the hallmark eye paint, has re-emerged this holiday season as a signature part of Target’s efforts to revive its fading cachet.
articles.lead_paragraph: As the country geared up for the latest “Star Wars” extravaganza, Bullseye lounged at a private spa outside Los Angeles, soaking in a bath, sprawling out for a massage and offering up her padded feet for a pedicure.
